name: The Moisture Shot Hydrating Hair Goal Concentrate Mix-In
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Masks
about: What it is: A Hair Goal Concentrate that locks in moisture by creating a mesh net around the hair fiber, quenching thirsty strands. The Moisture Shot Hair Goal Concentrate is great for all hair types but is especially recommended for curly and coily hair who need extra moisture to protect their curls and coils...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Oily Scalp..Key Benefits:.- Quenches thirsty strands.- Locks in moisture..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Red and Brown Algae Extract: Boosts moisture...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Add this Hair Goal Concentrate to your Function of Beauty PRO Shampoo or Conditioner Mask to fully customize your formula. Add up to three Hair Goal Concentrates per product to address a range of haircare concerns. Due to the concentration of natural ingredients the formulas may appear colored...Fragrance Description: Fragrance free.
ingredients: -Red and Brown Algae Extract: Boosts moisture...Hypnea Musciformis Extract, Sargassum Filipendula Extract, Sorbitol, Gelidiella Acerosa Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-With the spout facing up, push back the tab to snap open..-Pour entire contents into your Function of Beauty PRO Product. .-Shake or stir for 15 seconds until fully mixed in..-Add up to three Hair Goal Concentrates per Function of Beauty PRO Product... Recycling Instructions:.-100% Recyclable Carton made of FSC Certified cardboard.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just got home and opened my package and itu2019s half empty! Itu2019s kind of ridiculous how little product is in this container. Wouldnu2019t buy again

reviews.review_title: Would not buy again did nothing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this hoping for some hydration and softness in my hair this is NOT what I gotu2026.. I got 3 different kinds of this shot and they all have a different amount of product in them. I got a pea sized amount of product compared to others who got double the amount. No changes in my hair seen. Smelled like hair dye. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just used this for the first time and immediately ordered more. I mixed it into my own conditioner. Iu2019ve been at the beach for awhile and my hair was very dry and the ends kept tangling ( I have pretty long hair). I noticed this worked immediately. I let it sit in my hair for about 10 min in the shower.

reviews.review_text: I bought these thinking that I could use them in other shampoos or conditioners , Iu2019m scared to put them in there incase itu2019s not good. Was hoping it could just be in an oil form to put in a small bit in the shower

reviews.review_title: Half of content on the small container

reviews.review_text: I liked this product before, decided to buy for the second time and have received only the half of the product that used to be. I think was an error, and unfortunately I didnu2019t took a picture before opening. I will not buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is so thankful for this moisture concentrate mix in. My hair suffers from dry, damaged strands. The over processing has really taken a toll on my hair. After using this product, Iu2019ve seen a huge difference in my hair. This product has replenished my hair with much needed moisture. My hair feels much more hydrated, smoother, and softer. After just one use, I saw a major turnaround with my hair. This is definitely a product I will be purchasing over and over again. I love it so much that Iu2019m always raving and recommending it to all my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3c curls that gets frizzy easily if I donu2019t use the right products. I like this product it definitely helped define my curls a bit more. But I have long think hair I feel like I needed more product, so I donu2019t really care for the packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite thing about Function of Beauty is how you can customize it to your needs. I love the moisture shot concentrate, because I can control what I put in to the leave-in conditioner. My hair looks and feels so hydrated and moisturized!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I appreciate this brand and this hair care method is incomparable to the customization abilities. I have type 3c/4a hair and my curly hair often lacks enough hydration, definition, and is prone to frizz. I used this particular mix in concentrates in the leave in treatment after reverting my hair back to its natural state after a silk press and it brought back so much moisture to my curls. I was impressed with how well my curls bounced back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has helped my curls feel softer and more hydrated mixed with the curl leave in conditioner! I love that I can use the correct amount of concentrate to the leave in conditioner so that they work great together!

reviews.review_title: Amazing Addition to Pre-Wash Day Treatment Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, I bought them for the same reason youu2019re reading my review: theyu2019re adorable! Iu2019m sure everyone wants to know if they work with other products, I got you, e-besties! They do!   Using their pictures for reference, donu2019t expect them to be thick as depicted in the first two photographs. The third picture is a more accurate representation, as itu2019s an oil, not a cream.   I tested this on my own hair, as well as my daughters 3C hair. I mixed hers with the Alterna MHMC conditioning mask and mixed mine with Amikau2019s conditioning mask.   I have a pretty intensive haircare routine and focus more on preventative care and maintenance. My daughter, however, has highlighted her hair which impacted her curl pattern, leaving her with a combination of 3b, 3c and 4a curls. This was a wonderful addition to our masks we use before wash day!   Iu2019ll definitely be investing in all of the different types, as I do wash day for a few friends and family. I personally think theyu2019re great to add to a mask or at least to conditioner.   Iu2019m selective about shampos & conditioners and while I can tell this is a lovely brand, I donu2019t plan to buy anything but these AddOn packs. But Iu2019m sure a verified purchase with an honest review of those products will show up eventually (donu2019t act like we trust influenster reviews, lol).   Iu2019ll try and get reviews up fast once the others arrive and I test them out! Iu2019m ordering them as soon as I post this!!!

reviews.review_title: SO smart! So easy to add and use.

reviews.review_text: My hair is wavy with quite a few root defined ringlets as well, but I swim every day in chlorine. I also bleached for years... so I need help.  My goal is always to have my waves air dry into their glory, so if I can nourish my hair in the shower with my shampoo and conditioner, I am ahead of the game.  I REALLY like the moisture shot because I can personalize and add EXACTLY what my hair needs to my shampoo and conditioner. I am using the whole line and added this to the mask and my hair is looking amazing. I cant wait to add more shots to my hair care! This is so smart. (complimentary from functionofbeauty)

reviews.review_text: The Function of Beauty PRO Moisture Shot Hydrating Hair Goal Concentrate Mix - In was a great addition to my hair care routine. I mixed it into my Custom Recovery Conditioner Mask and it even made my hair softer and more defined. I received this product complimentary from Function of Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how customizable these hair goals concentrate mix-in are. They are very easy to use. Making it perfect to target different hair concerns that I have throughout the year. I put this moisturizer shot in my shampoo and conditioner. It has helped a lot with my dry curly hair. Gifted by Function of Beauty PRO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Moisturize Shot,has truly redefined the way I care for my hair. This little bottle of magic has become an integral part of my hair care routine, delivering a boost of hydration and nourishment that my hair craves. The concept of a concentrated mix-in is brilliant. It allows me to address my specific hair concerns u2013 in this case, moisture u2013 with a targeted solution. The formula itself is lightweight yet potent, and I was amazed by how a few drops could make such a noticeable difference. Adding 'The Moisturize Shot' to my shampoo or conditioner takes my hair care experience to the next level. It's like giving my hair a drink of water, quenching its thirst and leaving it softer and smoother.  Gifted by Function of Beauty PRO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Function of Beauty Pro recently gifted me their new moisture shot mix in and have enjoyed this formulation. It's a great product to add into the moisturizer mask for my long, course and frizzy hair to make it smoother and easier to work with. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Function of Beauty's Moisture Hair Shot is a revolutionary addition to their lineup, designed to offer a boost of hydration and nourishment that can be tailored to your hair's specific needs. As someone who's always on the lookout for ways to enhance my hair care routine, I was intrigued by the concept of a customizable moisture shot, and I'm pleased to report that it lives up to its promises.  The standout feature of the Moisture Hair Shot is its ability to address dryness and lack of hydration in a targeted manner. This product seamlessly integrates with your existing shampoo and conditioner, allowing you to create a personalized formula that caters to your hair's unique characteristics.  What truly impressed me was the convenience and versatility it offers. Whether your hair needs a little extra TLC during colder months or you've been experiencing increased dryness, this shot provides a quick solution to amplify your hair care routine. It's perfect for those who want to optimize their hair care products without overhauling their entire regimen.  The application process is straightforward and seamless. Mixing the shot into your shampoo or conditioner doesn't alter the consistency or scent of the product, ensuring a consistent and enjoyable experience. This is a crucial factor for those who are sensitive to changes in their hair care products.  I noticed a tangible difference after incorporating the Moisture Hair Shot into my routine. My hair felt notably softer, smoother, and less prone to frizz. It seemed to absorb the shot's hydrating benefits, resulting in a healthier and more vibrant appearance.  The shot also complements Function of Beauty's philosophy of customization, allowing you to create a treatment that aligns with your hair's ever-changing needs. It's an effective solution for managing various hair concerns, all in a single product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the coolest thing they couldu2019ve came out with I live being able to customize to my hair needs . My hair is curly 3a/3b and I experience tangles , frizz and difficulty getting shine and definition. This mess really helped be customize and know Iu2019m doing something to help my hair . It also makes me feel like a little science girly :) Gifted by Function of Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the cute little shots and I love how theyu2019re shaped like Fs. Theyu2019re easy to open, easy to mix and they do work I feel. Just open them and pop them in your shampoos conditioners or hair masks. I got three, moisture shot,curl executive, and frizz tamer and they all work beautifully. Gifted by function of beauty PRO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was super helpful after swimming in a lake all day. Typically my hair becomes super dry and lacks the moisture it needs. This serum helped get it back to normal. This was gifted by Function of Beauty PRO.

This product, complimentary from Function of Beauty Pro, is really great because it allows me to customize the benefits I get from the product. My hair really looks healthy and shiny when balanced with moisture and anti-frizz, so Iu2019m happy to be able to use the concentrates to help me achieve that!

reviews.review_title: Great mix in perfect for curly hair

reviews.review_text: I love the fact that this line is so customizable. You can add different shots to the products and make it totally unique for you. My hair needs all the moisture it can get and this add in is perfect for my dry frizzy curls. I received this complimentary from Function of Beauty PRO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never seen this type of product anywhere in the beauty market. A concentrate to add more benefits to your hair products, there is nothing better to enhance the natural beauty of your hair. My curly hair is better than even because I added these concentrates to my shampoo and hair mask that I was gifted by Function of Beauty Pro. They helped my hair to increase shine, and you know that curly hair needs the extra help with moisturizing. They also provide more definition to my curly hair, making the pattern more curly and voluminous. Adding these products definitely positive impact how I feel for my curls because it is hard to find good products that work for my curly hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging designs on every product in this line is SO well thought out! There is enough space in the shampoo to fully add the mix-ins. I tried a different brand last year that was much more difficult to mix and also didnu2019t work that well. These seem much more thoughtful in design and function. The Moisture Shot does add a good amount of moisture and now I want to try some of the others! Complimentary from Function of Beauty PRO.

I added the frizz genius to the shampoo, then added the moisture shot & the curl executive to the conditioner mask. I love how soft & bouncy my curls are. I dye my hair often & am on a journey of healing my curls. I feel like these products have helped revive my curls.
